creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: portrait of a wrinkled Native American man with shoulder-length hair wearing a headband, with head turned toward PL
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

LLC, in pencil: [For my friend Edward Conwanghton (?) / Christmas 1945]

title: Hopi Medicine Man
